name: Shell Alvania Grease 0854
description: Special Automotive Steering Rack & Pinion Grease

localDocs.name: Alvania 0854 United States EN 140002686046 EHS V9.0 10-MAR-2023

marketing: Shell Alvania 0854 is a Lithium base grease specially designed for use in steering rack and pinion gears of manual as well as hydraulic supported steering systems in different types of vehicles. A special additives combination provides low friction at slow motion as well as extreme pressure protection. Alvania 0854 has excellent low temperature properties to ensure steering rack function down to –35°C.
